description: AzureCustomerManagedBootDiagnostics provides reference to a customer managed storage account.

storageAccountURI.description: StorageAccountURI is the URI of the customer managed storage account. The URI typically will be `https://<mystorageaccountname>.blob.core.windows.net/` but may differ if you are using Azure DNS zone endpoints. You can find the correct endpoint by looking for the Blob Primary Endpoint in the endpoints tab in the Azure console.
